title: Amazon | SDE 1 Fresher | India
content:
## <b/> Amazon SDE I Offer Details:

**Education:** B.E in CS from Tier 3 College
**Years of Experience:** 7 Months Internship Experience at Startup 
**Date of the Offer:** Feb/2025
**Company:** Amazon  
**Title/Level:** Software Development Engineer I (SDE I)  
**Location:** Bangalore, India  

### **Compensation**
- **Base Salary:** ₹19,17,000 per year  
- **Relocation Bonus:** ₹1,50,000  
- **Signing Bonus:**  
  - Year 1: ₹6,47,000  
  - Year 2: ₹5,18,000  
- **Stock Bonus (RSUs):** ₹15,56,000 vested over 4 years  
- **Total Compensation (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** ~₹25L (Year 1) / ~₹24L (Year 2)  

### **Benefits**
- **Leave Policy:**  
  - 15 working days of annual leave per financial year.  
  - 12 calendar days of sick leave per financial year.  
  - 12 calendar days of casual leave per financial year.  
  - 10 mandatory and optional holidays per calendar year.  
- **Transportation Allowance:**  
  - ₹4,000 per month for employees in Tier 1 cities (Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Mumbai, NCR, Kolkata).  
  - ₹1,500 per month for other cities.  

* And Many More Amazon Benefits..

title: Okta | SSE | Bangalore | Jan 2025 [Accepted]
content:

I didn’t have any better offer. 
Hope this helps you guys in your compensation discussions! 🚀

title: Deloitte NLA Analyst Trainee
content:
**Education:** B.Tech from a Tier-3 college, Circuital branch  
**Years of Experience:** 6 months (Internship at an early-stage startup)  
**Prior Experience:** Internship at an early-stage startup  

**Date of the Offer:** December 2024  
**Company:** Deloitte  
**Title/Level:** Analyst Trainee  
**Location:** Hyderabad  

**Salary:** ₹4.5 LPA  
**Relocation/Signing Bonus:** ₹10K (Relocation) + ₹40K (One-time stipend) + ₹50K (Joining bonus after 1 year)  
**Stock Bonus:** N/A  
**Bonus:** N/A  
**Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** ₹4.5 LPA + relocation+joining bonuses  

**Benefits:** Health insurance  
**Other Details:** Standard Deloitte benefits package
